name: Mini Limitless Lash Lengthening Mascara
about: What it is: A buildable, flake-free mascara that lengthens, lifts, and curls for more voluminous lashes...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Shea Butter: Conditions and protects against irritation..- Beeswax: Coats and lengthens the look of lashes with soft flexibility and hold..- Keratin: Fortifies and promotes healthy lashes...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This lightweight, nourishing formula contains beeswax and carnauba wax to weightlessly condition your lashes. Shea butter and keratin fortify to enhance and nourish the look of lash condition. A dual-sided brush allows you to define, lift, and separate lashes with precision. Limitless Lash Mascara is ophthalmologist-tested, safe for sensitive eyes, and safe for contact lens wearers...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...
ingredients: -Arginine (Keratin): Fortifies and nurtures lashes..-Shea Butter: Weightlessly conditions lashes..-Beeswax: Nourishes lashes... Water, Beeswax*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax *, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Xanthan Gum, Arginine, Phenethyl Alcohol, Biotin, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Benzoic Acid, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Iron Oxide (Ci 77499).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start with the shorter bristles at the base of your lash line, and move the brush with a slight wiggle motion, back-and-forth, to add definition. .-Pull the brush up to the top of lashes to lift and extend. .-Reverse the brush to the side with elongated bristles to lengthen the look of lashes and add visible volume. .-One coat lifts and extends while several coats gives you a voluminous look that stays put. .-This formula removes easily with soap and water.

reviews.review_title: Beware - Mini size is truly mini
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the mini size and it was indeed very mini. I was SHOCKED that I paid $13 for a sample sized tube of mascara. I don't know how many applications I'll be able to get out of this bottle but it can't be many. the product overall is ok. It has a strong floral scent that I don't love and the brush is weird because some bristles are brush like while others are stubby. I'm sure there is a reason for this but I think I prefer my cheap, Walmart mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ILIA Mascara is a fave for lash lengthening and no clumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been buying and rebuying this product for years. i’ve never had raccoon eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best, the mascara is not long wearing and you have to build up for volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Happy that it’s a clean product. However the bottle came very dry. Hardly anything on the brush during application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I WILL BUY THE FULL SIZE IF THIS BECAUSE IT MAKES ME LOOK LIKE I HAVE FAKE LASHES! IT SEPARATES THEM SO GOOD! YOU CAN LITERALLY PUT 100 LAYERS OF THIS AND YOUR EYELASHES WILL STILL BE SEPARATED! BUY IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sampler from another product and let me tell you... I'm a picky girl when it comes to my lashes but this is BY FAR the BEST mascara I've ever tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product was not the best. i appiled it to my lashes after curling and it make them go down right away. when i had to curl it again it was just not working. it took me over 20 minutes to get it to look good with help from my other mascara. wgood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it’s not worth buying the mini…it’s literally pea sized also it’s a little clumpy but I like the applicator. Overall not worth it and I was disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It has a almond-ish and honey smell, super lengthening, the applicator is good for wispy lashes, but The applicators' bristles are quite hard so be careful when applying!<3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara!! the applicator is amazing, I love the lengthening and volume! It do smell weird but I still love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't irritate my sensitive eyes at all. It lasted for hours with no transfer or smudging! It stays in place and looks beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: fav mascara EVERRRR dont know what id do without it tbh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FINALLY!!! A cruelty free mascara that gives me a natural look. I have been searching for a mascara that looks totally natural and doesn’t clump. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara makes my lashes look sooo long! The mini is great for travel and last a long time! I’ve had it for a year and it’s still almost full!! I love this and definitely recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really impressed with the performance of this mascara! The dual-sided applicator is a great feature and makes it easy to achieve both volume and Length. My only concern is the strong scent of the formula—it’s noticeable when applying, but it does fade once on. While it doesn’t linger, it’s still something to consider if you’re sensitive to scents. Overall, though, it’s a solid mascara with great results!

reviews.review_title: Good mascara but made my lashes look straight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this mascara didn’t hold my curl at all but definitely lengthened and thickened my lashes. I did not like the smell tho it smells weird. But overall great lengthens mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have repurchased 3 times after receiving a sample. I don’t think I will replace it or try any other mascara again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: fav mascara EVERRRR dont know what id do without it tbh
